Package mru.game.model

Class PuntoBancoGame

java.lang.Object
mru.game.model.CardDeck
mru.game.model.PuntoBancoGame
public class PuntoBancoGame
extends CardDeck

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    PuntoBancoGame​(int money)
    Constructor which initializes the Scanner, Creates the card deck, and gets the game started when called

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addBankerScore​(int rank)
    Calculates the bankers score based on the card they picked up.
    void addPlayerScore​(int rank)
    Calculates the players score based on the card they picked up.
    int askBet()
    Asks the player how much they would like to bet and sets that as the bet.
    void bankerDrawCheck​(int playerCard)
    Uses switch statements to determine if the banker needs to draw an additional card based on the card the player drew and the current score of the banker
    void bankerThirdDraw()
    Draws a third card for the banker and sets extraBankerCard to true, which indicates that a third card will need to be displayed later
    char betChoice()
    Asks the player if they would like to bet on the Punto, Banco, or a tie.
    void determineWinner()
    Determines if the game is a Punto win, a Banco win, or a Egalite.
    int gettotalcash()
    Return the players total balance at the end of this game.
    int getwins()
    Return the wins the player got this game.
    void initializeGame()
    Sets the game up by creating objects for the players cards, the bankers card, as well as setting each sides score to zero.
    void playerThirdDraw()
    Draws a third card for the player and sets extraPlayerCard to true, which indicates that a third card will need to be displayed later
    void playGame()
    Goes though the steps to actually play the game, this involves calling several other methods for a variety of reasons
    void results()
    Calculates the players winnings based on their bet and the result of the game and shows an appropriate message.

  • Constructor Details

    • PuntoBancoGame

      public PuntoBancoGame​(int money) throws java.io.IOException
      Constructor which initializes the Scanner, Creates the card deck, and gets the game started when called
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

  • Method Details

    • playGame

      public void playGame() throws java.io.IOException
      Goes though the steps to actually play the game, this involves calling several other methods for a variety of reasons
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • betChoice

      public char betChoice()
      Asks the player if they would like to bet on the Punto, Banco, or a tie. Also displays an error message if they do not make a valid selection
      Returns:
      option

    • initializeGame

      public void initializeGame()
      Sets the game up by creating objects for the players cards, the bankers card, as well as setting each sides score to zero. It also draws the first 4 cards already, but does not actually show them to the player yet

    • addPlayerScore

      public void addPlayerScore​(int rank)
      Calculates the players score based on the card they picked up. It does this by setting each face card to zero and using remainder division to keep the total under 10
      Parameters:
      rank -

    • addBankerScore

      public void addBankerScore​(int rank)
      Calculates the bankers score based on the card they picked up. It does this by setting each face card to zero and using remainder division to keep the total under 10
      Parameters:
      rank -

    • playerThirdDraw

      public void playerThirdDraw()
      Draws a third card for the player and sets extraPlayerCard to true, which indicates that a third card will need to be displayed later

    • bankerThirdDraw

      public void bankerThirdDraw()
      Draws a third card for the banker and sets extraBankerCard to true, which indicates that a third card will need to be displayed later

    • bankerDrawCheck

      public void bankerDrawCheck​(int playerCard)
      Uses switch statements to determine if the banker needs to draw an additional card based on the card the player drew and the current score of the banker
      Parameters:
      playerCard -

    • determineWinner

      public void determineWinner()
      Determines if the game is a Punto win, a Banco win, or a Egalite. If the player won under any of these circumstances it calculates the players payout, or sets the payout to zero if the player lost under any of these circumstances

    • askBet

      public int askBet()
      Asks the player how much they would like to bet and sets that as the bet. Also returns an error if the bet is not an integer.
      Returns:
      bet

    • results

      public void results() throws java.io.IOException
      Calculates the players winnings based on their bet and the result of the game and shows an appropriate message. Also asks the player if they would like to play again.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • getwins

      public int getwins()
      Return the wins the player got this game.
      Returns:
      wins

    • gettotalcash

      public int gettotalcash()
      Return the players total balance at the end of this game.
      Returns:
      totalcash
